mapper.select: select id, menu_id, menus_title, menu_type,menu_path, parent_id, create_time, last_modified_time, remark from back_sys_menus where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into back_sys_menus(menu_id, menus_title, menu_type,menu_path, parent_id, create_time, last_modified_time, remark) values (#{menuId}, #{menusTitle}, #{menuType},#{menuPath}, #{parentId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{remark})

insert into back_sys_menus(menu_id, menus_title, menu_type,menu_path, parent_id, create_time, last_modified_time, remark) values
(#{entity.menuId}, #{entity.menusTitle}, #{entity.menuType},#{entity.menuPath}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into back_sys_menus(menu_id, menus_title, menu_type,menu_path, parent_id, create_time, last_modified_time, remark) values
(#{entity.menuId}, #{entity.menusTitle}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.menuPath}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update menu_id = values(menu_id), menus_title = values(menus_title), menu_type = values(menu_type), menu_path = values(menu_path), parent_id = values(parent_id), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update back_sys_menus
menu_id = #{menuId},
menus_title = #{menusTitle},
menu_type = #{menuType},
menu_path = #{menuPath},
parent_id = #{parentId},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
